attributes.name: btnStyle
attributes.description: Button Style

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Is the button currently disabled

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Circle Button with icon

attributes.name: loaderPosition
attributes.description: If there is need to change loader position, pass the position

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: Is the button currently loading

attributes.name: miniIcon
attributes.description: Mini Circle Button with icon

attributes.name: wide
attributes.description: Is the button wide

attributes.name: channels
attributes.description: Channels.

attributes.name: donatingAmount
attributes.description: Donating amount.

attributes.name: productId
attributes.description: Product id

attributes.name: productStatus
attributes.description: Product Status.Defaults to sale

attributes.name: productType
attributes.description: Product type. Defaults to product

attributes.name: quantity
attributes.description: Product Quantity

attributes.name: allowInput
attributes.description: Allows the user to enter a date directly into the input field. By default, direct entry is disabled.

attributes.name: allowInvalidPreload
attributes.description: Allows the preloading of an invalid date. When disabled, the field will be cleared if the provided date is invalid

attributes.name: altFormat
attributes.description: Exactly the same as date format, but for the altInput field.

attributes.name: altInput
attributes.description: Show the user a readable date (as per altFormat), but return something totally different to the server.

attributes.name: altInputClass
attributes.description: This class will be added to the input element created by the altInput option. Note that altInput already inherits classes from the original input.

attributes.name: appendTo
attributes.description: Instead of body, appends the calendar to the specified node instead.

attributes.name: ariaDateFormat
attributes.description: Defines how the date will be formatted in the aria-label for calendar days,  using the same tokens as dateFormat. If you change this, you should choose a  value that will make sense if a screen reader reads it out loud.

attributes.name: autoFillDefaultTime
attributes.description: Whether the default time should be auto-filled when the input is empty and gains or loses focus.

attributes.name: clickOpens
attributes.description: Whether clicking on the input should open the picker.  Set it to false if you only want to open the calendar programmatically with [open()]

attributes.name: closeOnSelect
attributes.description: Whether calendar should close after date selection or not

attributes.name: conjunction
attributes.description: When in "multiple" mode, conjunction is used to separate dates in the entry field.

attributes.name: dateFormat
attributes.description: A string of characters which are used to define how the date will be displayed in the input box.  The supported characters are defined in the table below.

attributes.name: dateParser
attributes.description: A custom datestring parser

attributes.name: defaultDate
attributes.description: Sets the initial selected date(s). If you're using mode: "multiple" or a range calendar supply an  Array of Date objects or an Array of date strings which follow your dateFormat. Otherwise, you can supply  a single Date object or a date string.

attributes.name: defaultHour
attributes.description: Initial value of the hour element, when no date is selected

attributes.name: defaultMinute
attributes.description: Initial value of the minute element, when no date is selected

attributes.name: defaultSeconds
attributes.description: Initial value of the seconds element, when no date is selected

attributes.name: disable
attributes.description: Disables certain dates, preventing them from being selected.  See https://chmln.github.io/flatpickr/examples/#disabling-specific-dates

attributes.name: disableMobile
attributes.description: Set this to true to always use the non-native picker on mobile devices.  By default, Flatpickr utilizes native datetime widgets unless certain options (e.g. disable) are used.

attributes.name: enable
attributes.description: Disables all dates except these specified. See https://chmln.github.io/flatpickr/examples/#disabling-all-dates-except-select-few

attributes.name: enableSeconds
attributes.description: Enables seconds selection in the time picker.

attributes.name: enableTime
attributes.description: Enables the time picker

attributes.name: formatDate
attributes.description: Allows using a custom date formatting function instead of the built-in handling for date formats using dateFormat, altFormat, etc.

attributes.name: hourIncrement
attributes.description: Adjusts the step for the hour input (incl. scrolling)

attributes.name: inline
attributes.description: Displays the calendar inline

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description: The locale, either as a string (e.g. "ar", "en") or as an object. See https://chmln.github.io/flatpickr/localization/

attributes.name: maxDate
attributes.description: The maximum date that a user can pick to (inclusive).

attributes.name: maxTime
attributes.description: The minimum date that a user can start picking from (inclusive).

attributes.name: minDate
attributes.description: The minimum date that a user can start picking from (inclusive).

attributes.name: minTime
attributes.description: The minimum time that a user can start picking from (inclusive).

attributes.name: minuteIncrement
attributes.description: Adjusts the step for the minute input (incl. scrolling) Defaults to 5

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: Date selection mode, defaults to "single"

attributes.name: monthSelectorType
attributes.description: How the month should be displayed in the header of the calendar. If showMonths has a value greater than 1, the month is always shown as static.

attributes.name: nextArrow
attributes.description: HTML for the arrow icon, used to switch months.

attributes.name: noCalendar
attributes.description: Hides the day selection in calendar. Use it along with enableTime to create a time picker.

attributes.name: onChange
attributes.description: Fires when the selected dates have changed - when a date is picked or cleared, by user or programmatically.

attributes.name: onClose
attributes.description: Fires when the calendar is closed

attributes.name: onDayCreate
attributes.description: Fires for every day cell in the calendar, where the fourth argument is the html element of the cell.  See https://chmln.github.io/flatpickr/events/#ondaycreate

attributes.name: onDestroy
attributes.description: Fires before the calendar instance is destroyed

attributes.name: onKeyDown
attributes.description: Fires when valid keyboard input for calendar is detected

attributes.name: onMonthChange
attributes.description: Fires after the month has changed

attributes.name: onOpen
attributes.description: Fires after the calendar is opened

attributes.name: onParseConfig
attributes.description: Fires after the configuration for the calendar is parsed

attributes.name: onReady
attributes.description: Fires once the calendar instance is ready

attributes.name: onValueUpdate
attributes.description: Like onChange, but fires immediately after any date changes

attributes.name: onYearChange
attributes.description: Fires after the year has changed

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Placeholder text to show on the input element

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: How the calendar should be positioned with regards to the input. Defaults to "auto"

attributes.name: positionElement
attributes.description: The element off of which the calendar will be positioned. Defaults to the date input

attributes.name: prevArrow
attributes.description: HTML for the left arrow icon, used to switch months.

attributes.name: shorthandCurrentMonth
attributes.description: Whether to display the current month name in shorthand mode, e.g. "Sep" instead "September"

attributes.name: showMonths
attributes.description: The number of months to be shown at the same time when displaying the calendar.

attributes.name: static
attributes.description: Position the calendar inside the wrapper and next to the input element*.

attributes.name: time_24hr
attributes.description: Displays time picker in 24 hour mode without AM/PM selection when enabled.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Two way data binding to retrieve the selected date[time] value

attributes.name: weekNumbers
attributes.description: Enables display of week numbers in calendar.

attributes.name: wrap
attributes.description: See https://chmln.github.io/flatpickr/examples/#flatpickr-external-elements

attributes.name: allowBrowse
attributes.description: Enable or disable file browser

attributes.name: allowDrop
attributes.description: Enable or disable drag n' drop

attributes.name: allowMultiple
attributes.description: Enable or disable adding multiple files

attributes.name: allowPaste
attributes.description: Enable or disable pasting of files. Pasting files is not supported on all browesrs.

attributes.name: allowProcess
attributes.description: Enable or disable the process button

attributes.name: allowRemove
attributes.description: When set to false the remove button is hidden and disabled

attributes.name: allowReorder
attributes.description: Allow users to reorder files with drag and drop interaction.  Note that this only works in single column mode.  It also only works on browsers that support pointer events.

attributes.name: allowReplace
attributes.description: Allow drop to replace a file, only works when allowMultiple is false

attributes.name: allowRevert
attributes.description: Enable or disable the revert processing button

attributes.name: checkValidity
attributes.description: Set to true to enable custom validity messages.  FilePond will throw an error when a parent form is submitted and it contains invalid files.

attributes.name: chunkForce
attributes.description: Force chunks even for files smaller than the set chunkSize

attributes.name: chunkRetryDelays
attributes.description: Amount of times, and delayes, between retried uploading of a chunk

attributes.name: chunkSize
attributes.description: The size of a chunk in bytes

attributes.name: chunkUploads
attributes.description: Enable chunked uploads, when enabled will automatically cut up files in chunkSize chunks before upload.

attributes.name: credits
attributes.description: Show credits at the bottom of the upload element. Structure is like [{label,url}]

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Sets the disabled attribute to the output field

attributes.name: dropOnElement
attributes.description: Require drop on the FilePond element itself to catch the file.

attributes.name: dropOnPage
attributes.description: FilePond will catch all files dropped on the webpage

attributes.name: dropValidation
attributes.description: When enabled, files are validated before they are dropped. A file is not added when it's invalid.

attributes.name: forceRevert
attributes.description: Set to true to require the file to be successfully reverted before continuing.

attributes.name: iconProcess
attributes.description: The icon used for process actions

attributes.name: iconRemove
attributes.description: The icon used for remove actions

attributes.name: iconRetry
attributes.description: The icon used for retry actions

attributes.name: iconUndo
attributes.description: The icon used for undo actions

attributes.name: ignoredFiles
attributes.description: Ignored file names when handling dropped directories. Dropping directories is not supported on all browsers.

attributes.name: instantUpload
attributes.description: Immediately upload new files to the server

attributes.name: itemInsertInterval
attributes.description: The interval to use before showing each item being added to the list

attributes.name: itemInsertLocation
attributes.description: Set to 'after' to add files to end of list (when dropped at the top of the list or added using browse or paste),  set to 'before' to add files at start of list.  Set to a compare function to automatically sort items when added

attributes.name: labelButtonAbortItemLoad
attributes.description: Label used for abort load button

attributes.name: labelButtonAbortItemProcessing
attributes.description: Label used for abort upload button

attributes.name: labelButtonProcessItem
attributes.description: Label used for upload button

attributes.name: labelButtonRemoveItem
attributes.description: Label used for remove button

attributes.name: labelButtonRetryItemLoad
attributes.description: Label used for retry load button

attributes.name: labelButtonRetryItemProcessing
attributes.description: Label used for retry upload button

attributes.name: labelButtonUndoItemProcessing
attributes.description: Label used for undo upload button

attributes.name: labelDecimalSeparator
attributes.description: The decimal separator used to render numbers. By default this is determined automatically.

attributes.name: labelFileLoadError
attributes.description: Label used when file load failed

attributes.name: labelFileLoading
attributes.description: Label used while loading a file

attributes.name: labelFileProcessing
attributes.description: Label used when uploading a file

attributes.name: labelFileProcessingAborted
attributes.description: Label used when upload was cancelled

attributes.name: labelFileProcessingComplete
attributes.description: Label used when file upload has completed

attributes.name: labelFileProcessingError
attributes.description: Label used when something went wrong during file upload

attributes.name: labelFileProcessingRevertError
attributes.description: Label used when something went wrong during reverting the file upload

attributes.name: labelFileRemoveError
attributes.description: Label used to indicate something went wrong when removing the file

attributes.name: labelFileSizeNotAvailable
attributes.description: Label used when no file size information was received

attributes.name: labelFileWaitingForSize
attributes.description: Label used while waiting for file size information.

attributes.name: labelIdle
attributes.description: Default label shown to indicate this is a drop area.  FilePond will automatically bind browse file events to the element with CSS class .filepond--label-action

attributes.name: labelInvalidField
attributes.description: Label shown when the field contains invalid files and is validated by the parent form.

attributes.name: labelTapToCancel
attributes.description: Label used to indicate to the user that an action can be cancelled.

attributes.name: labelTapToRetry
attributes.description: Label used to indicate to the user that an action can be retried.

attributes.name: labelTapToUndo
attributes.description: Label used to indicate to the user that an action can be undone.

attributes.name: labelThousandsSeparator
attributes.description: The thousdands separator used to render numbers. By default this is determined automatically.

attributes.name: maxFilesCount
attributes.description: The maximum number of files that the pond can handle

attributes.name: maxParallelUploads
attributes.description: The maxmimum number of files that can be uploaded in parallel

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Sets the required attribute to the output field

attributes.name: serverConfig
attributes.description: A server configuration object describing how FilePond should interact with the server.

attributes.name: storeAsFile
attributes.description: Tells FilePond to store files in hidden file input elements so they can be posted along with normal form post.  This only works if the browser supports the DataTransfer constructor (https://caniuse.com/mdn-api_datatransfer_datatransfer),  this is the case on Firefox, Chrome, Chromium powered browsers and Safari version 14.1 and higher.

attributes.name: productId
attributes.description: The product id for which the gifting system is required.

attributes.name: autoload
attributes.description: Is there is need to autoload next page when scroll next-page-autoload\

attributes.name: container
attributes.description: Class selector to know the container if it's not the host <salla-infinite-scroll>

attributes.name: item
attributes.description: Class selector to know list items

attributes.name: nextPage
attributes.description: Next Page element

attributes.name: currency
attributes.description: Currency code

attributes.name: language
attributes.description: Language code

attributes.name: price
attributes.description: Current product price

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Designates the component as anchor and applies the href attribute.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Designates the target attribute. This should only be applied when using the href prop.

values.name: _blank
values.description: Opens the linked document in a new window or tab

values.name: _parent
values.description: Opens the linked document in the parent frame

values.name: _self
values.description: Opens the linked document in the same frame as it was clicked (this is default)

values.name: _top
values.description: Opens the linked document in the full body of the window

values.name: framename
values.description: Opens the linked document in a named frame

attributes.name: bgColor
attributes.description: Spinner background color.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Spinner content color.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Sets the diameter of the circle in pixels, Defaults to 32

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Sets the stroke of the circle (border) in pixels, Defaults to 4

attributes.name: currency
attributes.description: Current currency (existing or newly selected)

attributes.name: language
attributes.description: Current language (existing or newly selected)

attributes.name: isEmailAllowed
attributes.description: Does the merchant allow to login using email

attributes.name: isEmailRequired
attributes.description: Does the merchant require registration with email & mobile

attributes.name: isMobileAllowed
attributes.description: Does the merchant/current location for visitor allow to login using mobile, By default outside KSA is false

attributes.name: supportWebAuth
attributes.description: Once the api verify success, it will be login the customer in web pages

attributes.name: centered
attributes.description: Align modal content to center, defaults to false

attributes.name: hasSkeleton
attributes.description: open the modal on rendering

attributes.name: iconStyle
attributes.description: Set the style of the header icon.

attributes.name: isClosable
attributes.description: Sets the modal to be closable. Defaults to true

attributes.name: isLoading
attributes.description: Show loading in the middle

attributes.name: noPadding
attributes.description: Avoid padding in the modal body or not, defaults to false

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: The position of the modal

attributes.name: subTitle
attributes.description: Set modal sub title.

attributes.name: subTitleFirst
attributes.description: Show subtitle before the title or not, defaults to false (after the title)

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description: open the modal on rendering

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: The size of the modal

attributes.name: alignment
attributes.description: Defines the alignment of contents. Defaults to [left]

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Custom icon to display, defaults to [sicon-inbox]

attributes.name: iconSize
attributes.description: The size of the icon. Defaults to [md]

attributes.name: channels
attributes.description: Notification channels

attributes.name: isSubscribed
attributes.description: is current user already subscribed

attributes.name: productId
attributes.description: product id that can visitor subscribe to its availability notification

attributes.name: orderId
attributes.description: The order id, to rate on its products & shipping

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Sets input name.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Sets the height and width of the component. Defaults to medium.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The rating value.

attributes.name: searchDisplayLimit
attributes.description: Dictates when to show the search field

attributes.name: selection
attributes.description: Optionally open the modal or enforce the pop-up to the viewer

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Sets the height of the input

attributes.name: inline
attributes.description: Set the component display without modal window. Defaults to false

attributes.name: oval
attributes.description: Adds a border radius to the input. Half of the height.

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description: Enable multiple item selection

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.description: Enable autofocus

attributes.name: chips
attributes.description: Changes display of selections to chips

attributes.name: clearIcon
attributes.description: Applied when using clearable and the input is dirty

attributes.name: clearable
attributes.description: Add input clear functionality, default icon is sicon-cancel

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Applies specified color to the control.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disable the input

attributes.name: flat
attributes.description: Remove elevation or box shadow.

attributes.name: hideDetail
attributes.description: Hides hint if any

attributes.name: hint
attributes.description: Hint text

attributes.name: itemDisabled
attributes.description: Set property of items’s disabled value

attributes.name: itemText
attributes.description: Set property of items’s text value

attributes.name: itemValue
attributes.description: Set property of items’s value - must be primitive.  Dot notation is supported.

attributes.name: items
attributes.description: Can be an array of objects or array of strings.  When using objects, will look for a text, value and disabled keys.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Sets label

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: Displays linear progress bar.

attributes.name: loadingColor
attributes.description: Specifies which color is applied to the progress bar.

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: Enable multiple item selection

attributes.name: persistHint
attributes.description: Forces hint to always be visible.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Sets the input’s placeholder text.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Enable multiple item selection

attributes.name: returnObject
attributes.description: Changes the selection behavior to return the object directly  rather than the value specified with item-value

attributes.name: shape
attributes.description: Define appearance of the component

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Sizing options

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The selected value

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Set the skeleton height

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Set the shape type of the skeleton is it circle or normal

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Set the skeleton width

attributes.name: platforms
attributes.description: selected platforms to share \

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: page url that will be shared custom \

attributes.name: urlName
attributes.description: page url name that will be shared custom \

attributes.name: itemPerView
attributes.description: Number of slides per view (slides visible at the same time on slider's container).

attributes.name: loop
attributes.description: Set to true to enable continuous loop mode. Defaults to false.

attributes.name: spaceBetweenItems
attributes.description: Distance between slide items in px. Defaults to 8px

attributes.name: speed
attributes.description: Duration of transition between slides (in ms). Defaults to 300ms.

attributes.name: backgroundColor
attributes.description: Background color

attributes.name: vertical
attributes.description: Align tabs vertically.

attributes.name: countryCode
attributes.description: Current country_code

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: input name

attributes.name: phone
attributes.description: Current mobile number

attributes.name: autoReload
attributes.description: should auto reloading the page after success verification

attributes.name: display
attributes.description: Should render component without modal

attributes.name: supportWebAuth
attributes.description: Once the api verify success, it will be login the customer in web pages

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Verifying method
